TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TextEmbeddedObject extends System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun

Docs.summary: Defines a type of text content in which measuring, hit testing and drawing of the entire content is done in whole.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An example of a TextEmbeddedObject is a button in the middle of a line of text.

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that determines if the text object is drawn from right to left.
A <xref:System.Boolean> value that determines if the text object is drawn with its side parallel to the baseline.
Docs.summary: Gets the computed bounding box of the text object.
Docs.returns: A value that represents the bounding box size of the text object.
